name: COVID CORONA KUSOGE
description:
A Generic Schmup with quickly made assets that we did in 48 hours during our quarantine. We ended up playing this game and passing it back and forth to see who got the highest score. Grab the health pickups to increase your ever decreasing health. But outside mindless self made fun, it's a pretty kusoge. =P

If enough people like it we may continue building on it, we already have ideas on level extensions, bosses, difficulty settings, and weapon upgrades.

- The game's resolution is 640x480. You'll have to click on that in the opening exe window.

- It's randomly generated, so pattern memorization won't work.

- If you consistently bang up against the wall, you might push through the collider, this was made in 48 hours.

- There's no exit for the application, so you'll have to alt enter to go full screen and alt  enter to exit fullscreen so you can exit the game.

Controls

- Press "R" to restart the level, press "T" to go back to title page.

- Press Space bar to shoot.

- WASD controls movement.
